WRITING.TITLE: Is this common?
WRITING.TEXT: When a pwBPD has a rage do they like writing non stop on whatsapp or everywhere? She raged and send me 74 whatsapp texts and called me 35 times one day. If i told her something she would write more walls of texts...like blocking whatever you say. Also some people point out that they lie, in her case is more like using things she knew about you which are true but exaggerating like they are the worsts things or something. I send her information for therapy in dbt and she acted like i wanted to attack her with psychological articles and send me one about victimism saying that i had that. I suspect she is also narcissistic denying any fault.
Do anyone knows where to find BPDs messages? people say narcissistics write very similar and you BPDs do that too
I got one where she says:Oh you should have known how to treat me because i'm BPD.
It was weird how fast and how many messages she could do with the cellphone in a short period of time.
She got 2 or 3 days like that then rested for 3 or 4 days and then made her tantrum for 2 or 3 days again. She was so concerned when i block or unblock her...
Hmm true, maybe other characteristics? like she loved talking to her ex flaunting her sexual acts with other guys (which her ex didn't get why she did that).

True. II don't talk to her i'm trying to deal with the aftermath. She had this wierd tendency of screaming secret stuff out of the air like she told a group of friends that one of them was gay (the girl was upset when she said that).
The tantrum was about two problems (A and B) so she complained for A, then you told her something and she switched with B then you told her something and switched to A, and that.......
Wow you detected his fallacy quick.

She thought every guy wanted something with her like my 60 year old neighbor. Also she changed her wording when she found how you reacted about something. She is a bad liar but sadly is improving (better hiding)

There were many red flags....i knew one of her ex story, a friend's story, she told different things to my bf, she lied to her uncle, she loved talking negative things all the time, she broke a police bike, she hates her exes but she kept communication with them
Think about it, how it feel to be loved and then discarded out of the blue. It's difficult.
Beautiful

WRITING.TITLE: Relationship chronology
WRITING.TEXT: How it started? What were the red flags? As a way of reconstruct the pieces together of her acts (the evolution). \-Met her, she was a friend. \-Lies to her uncle about where she goes and uses my friends and I as an excuse of going out when she was going with a guy. \-Lies that the guy was trying to take advantage of her when she was seeing him. \-Dated a friend. Was his first then she cheated on him with a guy with alcholism, went to parties, had sexual acts with fetish. Tried to go back to my friend after that. \-She met what she call "best friend" ( call her Salad) I don't know if that is the same as FP. \-She went back with one of her exes while trashing him. \-He did 2 police reports on her saying she hit him. She denied. My bf discovered it was a lie and then she changed to: he was harassing me. \-After we went to a salon she broke a police's minor bite and started to insult him, then run off. \-Salad got a bf. She fought with her. She told one of her exes that she slept with Salad's boyfriend and also told my bf. \-She lies to my friends that Salad's bf cheated her with someone unknown and now Salad wants to be alone like for her recovery problems. \-Then she called me out of the blue her "best friend". \-She met other bf's friend ( let's call him C) and he ignores her. She threatened him to tell his gf that he was cheating with her. \-She fought with one of my bf's friends and threatened with killing everyone with a knife. \-She want me to got to see a movie and I said no an hour before so she got pissed for 4 or 5 days and also got upset with me because C was working with my bf #194; #191;?. Now i block her. Of course nothing of what happened was her fault. She talked shit of her last exes and talked bad things of everyone she knew at their backs so I think she will do her smear campaign with the few friends we have in common. She had this habit to be with vulnerable people like depressed and then shifting the blame to them as they have a problem already for all the little or big things they did. Thanks for reading you can post your things too.

gt;If you're a grown-up but you act like this, your rights should be revoked since you're obviously not mature enough to deal with the responsibility that comes with being a grown-up. gt; gt;People's well-being is more important than the "rights" of a perpetrator. #8203; Now she is 26 and wants to go to US (California, Utah, Nevada), i knew her 8 years prior.... Tried to report her ex's friend in his college for stalking then she went after her ex where the guy shifted to her being agressive and did the but "he was the one stalking me". Also she tried to use feminist organizations when trying to report her ex from stalking. Ugh Ugh

I wonder if it went more stronger with the millenial era. But yeah modern feminism encourage this too. On a side note modern feminism is too emotional driven maybe there is high probability that many BPDs are feminists. Thankfully it seems organizations sisn't believe her because she was complaining how useless they were.
Well at least you could there is high probability of finding BPDs there and others.
Is the same as best friend? She had this tendency of naming someone like that
I know this Bpd that forgot her cellphone in the taxi and she called the guy she was at the moment and yelled that he should have seen the number of the taxi... #191;?
True....
My diagnosed BPD "friend" said that too
gt;Emotionally Unstable Personality Disorder Is like a BPD changed the name

Dunno...some do, i guess when they do they go to feel as the worst of the worst and have that tendency of wanting to suicide. The BPD i knew seems she was embarrased or projecting the fault on anyone else but at the same time telling everyone she was BPD as a way of saying everyone that they should threat her special.
My psychologist said that it was at the limit of sane or not.
Sometimes is like she does some kind of smirking

Many flags maybe the biggest: -She got reported to the police twice. She called my bf (as some kind of confidant). Her ex A reports her and she said he was lying. My bf read the reports and it said she went violent on him. She changed: to the guy was stalking her. She called her dad to defend her but he knew she was lying and was like: nope, she deserve it ( she got angry). Called one of her ex as witness (but the judge saw he was not in the scene so it was pointless). "A" had real witness.

I had this friend, pwBPD, that raged on me and was expecting me to be against her evil exes (or anyone against her) including my bf's best friend that was her ex. Once, she invited only males to her bday...and only one was someone she knew for some time.

My ex friend with BPD studies animation and she did a short of a gothic sadomasochist characters that found a guy in tener. The guy had a similar name to my bf, he was a nice guy that the girl followed him with a whip. One of the rooms had a guy where the girl cut his penis. At the end someone she ended with the first in a romance dinner. Wtf
A guy in tinder*
Oh the male friends........................... And you are right that is part of NC...not psysical or mental contact.

WRITING.TITLE: Describe your pwBPD
WRITING.TEXT: Maybe they are more common than it seems? Hair: Eyes: Body: Career: Bpd traits: Extra details: The pwBPD I knew (police descend) Hair: Black hair. Eyes: Black Eyes. Body: curvy, natural big bewbs, not tall Career: Graphic Design, Animation Bpd traits: tries to say things you would like, lies (for little things you have to talk with people she knew that now she don't see), changes the wording when you find out, loves her cellphone, can send you a walls of texts (word salad) and calls a lot, insults, she will project in you, blame you ( you are an abuser and stalker) , get everything bad you did from the past, threatens to do something against you (ex: tell your gf you are cheating with her), bad talk you to other people, threatens to hit you or just do it, every ex she had was bad many had mental illness, loves getting guys for sex and have a group of guys as "friends" and probably uses them for money or as their white knight depending her. Extra details: black and white tattoos/ one of led zeppelin in one are and the other in the should a big one of a Girl with horns and flowers ( maybe is her lol). In the night she makes a weird noise like uummmm in the night and can't walk straight in a line sober. Wants to go to USA (Utah, Nevada or California). 2 police reports.

I wonder if the pwBPD I knew also like about taking meds. She always said they made her feel bad maybe that was her excuse for not going to the psychiatrist... Also she lies once that she felt so bad for her period that she did went absent for a class once
Wow it seems a common faster is them caring a lot of their appereance.. Also the bpds traits

"overthink and overanalyze everything" That too. The pwBPD I knew thought a 60 year old neighbour was trying to be with her #191;? Or some guys from a store (and keep going to that store after complaint). Also wasobsessive with people's reactions

I have this pwBPD ...a "friend" bit i had to cut her. Don't not take responsability and act like a bully. You can't be a white knight or that would destroy you, she couldn't blame you for everything you did or not, true or not. There is this therapy pretty efective if she goes once a week with the psychologist monitoring twice per month, the dbt therapy but she will need to follow it to the letter. But remember, you can't save her, she may even turn on you and attack and blaming you for all.

I told her to go to the the psychopath un one hospital that was cheap and she decided to go to antes expensive one she can't keep paying and then she went out saying she has bpd but they only put her in some emotional workshops for a month and thats it.
I block her and unblock her once and she thought i was stalking her or things that i go to her FB or Instagram stalking.

WRITING.TITLE: Do they love getting vulnerable friends/bf/gf?
WRITING.TEXT: This pwBPD as "friend" i had loved to have exes with problems like depression, self steem, etc and had her best friend, the only female,that was with a controlling guy (at the end the bpd slept with the guy and her friend left her). Is that a possible pattern?

My psychologist treated a psychopath who was with a healthy person and the healthy was feeling disturbed..but yeah the pwBPD i knew used to choose men with problems and complaints why she was with them. She tried with someone but after he saw who she was he blocked her and she raged. And her first bf also cut her when she cheated on him and she raged calling him groomer (they dated at 18 which is legal and even was so happy to tell her uncle that she lost her virginity #191;?)

I thought so, the pwBPD i knew was kinda bully with close people. \-------- Oh even the wiki says: [**Personality disorder**](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Personality_disorder) **and codependent pairing** * [Borderline personality disorder](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Borderline_personality_disorder) #8211; there is a tendency for loved ones of people with borderline personality disorder (BPD) to slip into "caretaker" roles, giving priority and focus to problems in the life of the person with BPD rather than to issues in their own lives. Too often in these kinds of relationships, the codependent will gain a sense of worth by being "the sane one" or "the responsible one
Run

WRITING.TITLE: Weird thing about my cats and the BPD
WRITING.TEXT: I have 3 and they knew this pwBPD. She (the pwBPD) tried to give them good food sometimes like tuna or chicken but they rejected her offerings. But when my bf and I gave them that for they would eat them. I kind of suspect she attacking them when we were not close. I heard cats perceive energies? Do anyone went through something similar?
You are strong...how sick is using your video and trashing. She did something like that getting people who barely knows her and making them trash talk. So childish.
You have to be rigorous to follow the DBT therapy. I know cases of BPDs that ended working for banks (with their long psychological exams) and go undetected.

You are welcome :) remember and practice the rules (or make a list of the ones that you would use more if they are a lot). I did the therapy with a BPD expert psychologist, that therapy is useful for BPDs and non BPDs.
Congrats!
I try to watch videos of inner integration channel on YouTube she has in English too). Is more of narcisists but is similar with the NC.
Chernobyl that shit... Wtf thats creepy, it worries me the pwbpd I knew would do this (I but she she will say i'm stalking her).

One of her exes gave her a suitcase for travel and she gave it to me as a "gift" without saying why she had it. Is not that she needed to tell me but i wanted to keep track of the whole lot of things she hided. I guess i couldn't trust in her word anymore.

So even as friends they come back? ugh..... Well, they are aware if not how there is people recovering with DBT?. Just a small vent of not self awareness: The pwBDP i know she wanted to take away the boyfriend of a girl and she returned all sad crying saying the girl was envious. #191;?

Like the blue check on whatsapp?
Something that can help is making a table where you write the good things and bad things of the relationship. It helps to see things in perspective, if it even worth it.

Many, many things. She talked bad of others all the time, almost all day. Things she say to someone and then with others she will tell other thing. She has this habit of saying everyone wants to be with her or were stalking. My cats hated her, even if she gave them good food. Her interrogations, like 3 or more questions in a row (about your life). Her saying of: why you are reactions like that. Like guessing what what you think of something.

I know a BPD and from all the people i know she is the only who freaks out with the blue check and says: i know you read it!. I deactivated but she somehow sees it still. And then you think..wow before internet the people communicated their things waiting days for a response and nobody freaked out. I deactivated but she somehow sees it still.

Se should make a petition for rising awareness on this Whatsapp things. Of course is probably they would make nothing and se can't change others apps doing the same but it could rise awareness on its psychological effects. And there are non BPDs hating that too

I dos the dbt therapy, i'm not BPD because my therapist thought it could help. She has strict rules like: after therapy you can't interact with each other because she has a patient who made a friend and she felt so bad that wanted to suicide, after hearing this the other felt the need to suicide and told my therapist. My therapist also said that is good that they make groups for support but they needed the guise of a therapist or they could not solve anything. Or have a strong therapist with clear limits. She said ir not the bpd or therapist could take advantage and do sexual acta or whatever. Excuse my English.
I did the dbt (ugh this phone)
How old is she?
Well...the part of going to her room, refusing to eat...i thought she was a 15 yo or less o_o

The ex friend with BPD i knew trusted my bf. One day she called him because she was at the police because her ex did something to her and needed his help....ok She said the guy was stalking but my bf saw the Two reports that he did against her saying she hit him and has witnesses. When he asked her she said that his ex was lying. She called her dad and other of her co-dependent ex to testify. Her dad said to the judge that she deserve it (she got so upset about her dad) and the judge told her co-dependent ex: Judge:you were there? -No Judge: So what you have to do with this? -...

You didn't knew her husband, if he was narcisistic ( but BPDs loves low self steem people) and you don't have the reports. The only way yo know is asking him ir some of his Friends to have to other part of the story but that is dangerous for you. This is a lesson of not trusting one side of a story and don't be a white knight.
She may be BPD ir narcisistic, either way forcing you to do things she wants without caring about you seems toxic.
Omg i also thought she could be BPD

(She said in the Store) ... WRITING.TITLE: Do your pwBPD has weird walking patterns/balance?
WRITING.TEXT: Its weird but when she was undiagnosed the pwBPD i knew, used to walk recklessly without looking through street tracks or was so clumsy that broked some things. One of her exs even brought her to one of his friend's mom. The latter was a psychologist and by looking at her, said she could be BPD. Years later i went with her to a psychiatrist. The psychiatrist told her to walk in a straight line (like those tests for alchoholic people), she walked with balancing problema and the psychiatrist concluded that she may have BPD.

If you can, run,leave her. I knew this person with BPD for more of 8 years too. Talked bad of her exes, they always stalked or abuse her ( I talked with one of her exes, that is one of my friends,and he gave real details of how his relationship ended where she cheated in him). She lied a lot, I had her as roomate for 2 years, she raged once and threatened to kill everyone with a knife, broke things, harass me for 4-6 days with more than 100 text messages and calls. She manipulated in those texts, blamed, she was never at fault. Does she knows you have avpd? Well she would say you are crazy, and since she knew you, you were the worst thing to her. She raged once when some guy blocked her (he was her friend) but seems she wanted casual sex with him. She will tell you what you want to hear, give you attention until you do something. Go to bpdlovedones if you want more proof.
I thought she was a good person too....i she going to dbt therapy?
Is somewhat dificult, they love hiding their true self.

"Stands in everyone's way, gets enraged if others do it to him" That happened with her too (pwbpd), everyone was at fault except her, and she throw water to a girl's project and that's how they started their friendship (which is weird).
True, the pwBD was like that, clumsy, "forget to clean the living room" (i dunno if that was intentional), left things in the kitchen, etc.

I don't know if that is part of that too, but i asked a favor once and i had little time to do it and she did it with the speed of a snail (but loved to act like she was fast in doing things in the computer), i dunno if that was intentional thought.
gt; Any normal empathetic person would apologize and stop the behaviour. Sometimes people have to be reminded a few times but then will stop. True. They don't.
"emotionally abusive and manipulative" #8203; You did nothing wrong, if she was doing that it was your right to dismiss her for your own health.
She knew she was BPD? Why not using the insurance for a BPD treatment? What she did to improve herself? Nothing? If she did nothing, then why everything she does to herself is your fault?

WRITING.TITLE: Do you know if mormons have a lot of Borderlines?
WRITING.TEXT: BPD, borderline symptoms: (a lot of lies like psychopath/sociopaths/narcissists) #8203; * Having an unstable or dysfunctional self-image or a distorted sense of self (how one feels about one #8217;s self) * Feelings of isolation, boredom and emptiness * Difficulty feeling empathy for others * A history of unstable relationships that can change drastically from intense love and idealization to intense hate * A persistent fear of abandonment and rejection, including extreme emotional reactions to real and even perceived abandonment * Intense, highly changeable moods that can last for several days or for just a few hours * Strong feelings of anxiety, worry and depression * Impulsive, risky, self-destructive and dangerous behaviors, including reckless driving, drug or alcohol abuse and having unsafe sex * Hostility * Unstable career plans, goals and aspirations
She had kindness sometimes but it was for an exchange of something. She had no empathy.

WRITING.TITLE: Post party situation.
WRITING.TEXT: The pwbpd I knew raged for 4-6 days in June and some days in July. (I was planning in going but after what BPD did and her threatening to hit me, seriously she has no right to tell me how to handle the situation with X). I told X that I wouldn't go and that it has nothing to do with her and other person (I did not mentioned BPD). X said it was ok but after the party there was no contact, no even a question for it. X knew one of BPD's ex that is also my friend and after talk they ended as friends. But dunno it makes me wonder what stupidity said Bpd to X or the other friend (she knows nothing and said some shit before against me related to something that Bpd knew).
By validation you mean thaat they keep their exes just to hear: yeah you were right?. #8203; English is not my native language...............................

The pwBPD i knew got offended and said that i'm telling people she is a slut because she had 4 exes.....when is not that, i never said that and she even says that she search for dudes (but anyways we found that she gave nude photos of herself to dudes exchanging for money).
INTJ sometimes INFJ
Even as friend, she couldn't understand your needs and made orders to help them. It seems little but it was getting more frequent.
Those places are useless

You need a therapist, an activity, job, meditate, excercise, self care, try to calm yourself and stop ruminating the thoughts ( don't think it just do it). From your posts it seems that your problem is deeper than having being with a BPD. It seems like the the Bpd situation was a symptom of the real problem. This is your time for self improvement. This people prey on others with self steem problems and have no boundaries.
Maybe that's their new excuse. They are not slutty because they returned to the same guys she has met....lol

WRITING.TITLE: Is this..hoovering? i have 1 week of NC
WRITING.TEXT: Before NC, in the devaluation phase i give her resources of BPD (information) without telling her (any time i told her something she put her wall of text or excuses). She said after: oh you like using psychological articles for attacking! . #8203; So today i was using FB and she out of nowhere send me an article from a girl (that talked about borderline and i send her a video of her before NC) titled: #8203; "10 things i wish the people i love knew about BPD" #8203; After all the insults.....Is that hoovering?

WRITING.TITLE: So yeah...i feel bad
WRITING.TEXT: I have diagnosed AvPD (avoidant personality disorder), low self steem...I'm not from the US,and have been thinking of ending all. It makes me feel sad but i find it rational.... I told it to my brother and said i wanted attention (weird...in avpds?) and my father went all this you have a roof, you shouldn't feel like that and that. How i'm not? My last job was in a supermarket, low wage, i was doing good. The thing is, should i return to that job and resign? my father says is a stupid job but he doesn't give any options and the job was mostly physical so my back hurted a lot (i have a bad back posture, really bad and the job was making it hurt more). I have a career, sadly in my country the chances go up to be hired in a good place if you went to a renowned college. Mine is one that if you tell someone nobody hear of it.... Then i had this other situation with a "friend" who was borderline......i did not know how bad it was....i told her personal stuff so guess what she did? use it against me, insults, names, twisting things, lecture, texts of walls, all those things to make you feel worst in their devaluation phase.............. And this kind of people prey in vulnerable. That makes me wonder if i'm going to attract more of those kind of people which is worrisome. #8203; Thanks for listening.

Thanks!
gt;surround yourself with supportive people Yeah you will be surrounded when you tell them you have depression or sees you crying in a corner /sarcasm.
There is people who do excercirse, go to work, etc and feel depressed because their problems go beyond that.

Depression is like wearing negative glasses 24/7, you hate yourself, people, things, ruminate the thoughts making to stop feeling things. Like, my Gf cheated, then you hate yourself, maybe you parent abused and that's why they got that gf, the gf, people in general (you lose trust), society is bad too (people don't get it or their rules), then mix it with other problems: oh! bills to pay, debt, non supportive people, etc And of course some cases in the outside doesn't seem bad like: you have money, house, kids and still depressed or just you came to the conclussion by philosophising that life have no point. The first thing to help is not invalidating his situation and talk with him, why he is like that and try to see how bad it is (almost suicidal, too negative that say no to all your help?). I had been in pro choice sites for suicide and people are sick of the happy responses or ignoring them. Is magical when someone says (depends of how strong is negative fog): i'm sorry you are feeling like that, i had been in that situation, what can i do to help you, i know you are like this sadly you know that the only one who can get out is you but i can help. You can suggest therapy (help him find the best therapist for him), maybe therapy is not enough maybe he could use hipnosis for the thoughts or have a routine like meditate for identifying them. You can't force it or get angry if he fail some day but you can check him once in a while if he is doing things (not making him dependant of you), maybe invite him to get out of the house, have an activity (singing, running, etc) to distract him. Tell him that: no think just do it. Think in the moment, in the day (maybe he hates his past, talk to him about that and help him forgive it, forgive people and himself). The basics he can do is self care, do his bed, shower, organize his room, do the food, make him have a activities or goals in this 6 areas: work, education, family, social, spiritual (if he is into that), and distraction (my therapist says that you need balance in those, because let's say you depend in you family and they are terrible and you don't have friend work, etc is more easy to fall apart) Is a thing of being patient and check him, but you can't be dragged down and take care of yourself, sometimes seeing that in you can motivate him (and you can't help him if you feel bad). Maybe you could have a Jordan Peterson attitude of a strict father/mother but understanding (it depends in how he responds when someone give him directions for doing let's say laundry or the food). You can saw that too in thetype of psychologist he prefers: the ones with a nice tone or strict and asking what helps him more to do stuff. Also if he likes reading you can give him books like 6 pillars of self steem, or Tony Robbins Awaken The Giant Within (people says is awesome, who knows) that may help him kick his ass a little without being harsh. Well conclussion is a mix of being patient, discipline at the start and general (just do it) and self motivation once in a while (oh you cleaned you teeth? awesome, you didn't? no one is perfect, you fall but the point is get up). Tell him to live in the moment, not think of the past or future, not yet. He may blame himself for the time he wasted with being like that (that's why not to think in the past or forgive himself anytime). I'm struggling for many years but that's what i found.....and sorry for the grammar, english is not my native language.

I know my Dad does not care too like he is doing his things and stuff. He got upset when i honestly told him about my suicidal tendencies.....like i'm being honest, trying to scream saying: please help!. But nope....so what is left is that i have to convince myself of doing it i guess. Not for calling attention but for saying nothing matter anymore..........anyways.
